sqlMap.select: SELECT tablename FROM pg_tables WHERE tablename = 'cstudio_deploymenthistory';
sqlMap.insert: CREATE TABLE cstudio_deploymenthistory ( id bigserial NOT NULL, site varchar(35) NOT NULL, path text NOT NULL, publishing_channel varchar(255) NOT NULL, "user" varchar(35) NOT NULL, deployment_date timestamp NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT cstudio_deploymenthistory_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) );
CREATE INDEX cstudio_deploymenthistory_site_idx ON cstudio_deploymenthistory USING btree (site);

sqlMap.insert: CREATE INDEX cstudio_deploymenthistory_sitepath_idx ON cstudio_deploymenthistory USING btree (site, path);
sqlMap.select: select indexname from pg_indexes where indexname = 'cstudio_deploymenthistory_sitepath_idx';
sqlMap.insert: CREATE INDEX cstudio_deploymenthistory_user_idx ON cstudio_deploymenthistory USING btree ("user");
sqlMap.select: select indexname from pg_indexes where indexname = 'cstudio_deploymenthistory_user_idx';

sqlMap.select: select indexname from pg_indexes where indexname = 'cstudio_deploymenthistory_channel_idx';

sqlMap.select: select indexname from pg_indexes where indexname = 'cstudio_deploymenthistory_deploymentdate_idx';

SELECT c1.id, c1.site, c1.path, c1.publishing_channel, c1."user", c1.deployment_date FROM "cstudio_deploymenthistory" c1 inner join (select c2.path, MAX(c2.deployment_date) as deployment_date from "cstudio_deploymenthistory" c2 where c2.site = #site# GROUP BY c2.site, c2.path, DATE(c2.deployment_date)) c3 on c1.path = c3.path and c1.deployment_date = c3.deployment_date where c1.site = #site# order by c1.deployment_date desc
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO "cstudio_deploymenthistory" (site, path, publishing_channel, "user", deployment_date) VALUES (#site#, #path#, #publishingChannel#, #user#, #deploymentDate#)
